solution_line_template: There are {initial_chefs} chefs - {chefs_dropped} chefs = <<{initial_chefs}-{chefs_dropped}={chefs_left}>>{chefs_left} chefs left.
There are {initial_waiters} waiters - {waiters_dropped} waiters = <<{initial_waiters}-{waiters_dropped}={waiters_left}>>{waiters_left} waiters left.
In total there are {chefs_left} chefs + {waiters_left} waiters = <<{chefs_left}+{waiters_left}={total_left}>>{total_left} chefs and waiters left.
